entry.title: Experience using Jekyll
entry.content:
I think if I were to play around with Jekyll , I would get the hang of it more but it is sometimes confusing and has been slightly finicky on my Macbook. I think it would be great to use more often though.

Harp didn't want to install correctlly on my Mac so I cannot compare it to Jekyll. But, I am pretty sure that I will like Jekyll ore because at least it installed correctly.
entry.summary: I think if I were to play around with Jekyll , I would get the hang of it more but it is sometimes confusing and has been slightly finicky on my Macbook. I think it would be great to use more often though.

entry.title: Brandi
entry.content:
In my 30's. Mom. Wife. Sister. Friend. ect....

Took time off from classes due to bad car wreck in 2015.

Resumed classes in Spring 2021

Am really hoping that this will be my last semester and no other classes just "magically" need to be taken

Currently split time between Idaho and Nevada for my husbands job. Additionally, we get to travel more as a family because of his job
entry.summary: In my 30's. Mom. Wife. Sister. Friend. ect.... Took time off from classes due to bad car wreck in 2015. Resumed classes in Spring 2021 Am really hoping that this will be my last semester and no other classes just "magically" need to be taken Currently split time between Idaho and Nevada for my husbands job. Additionally, we get to travel more as a family because of his job

entry.title: Future
entry.content:
I think Jekyll would be great for a website that is for bloggers and those that are crafty ( think Pinterest) This allows a person to highlight specific topics, crafts, etc.

I also think using Jekyll would be great for those that love to post recipes
entry.summary: I think Jekyll would be great for a website that is for bloggers and those that are crafty ( think Pinterest) This allows a person to highlight specific topics, crafts, etc. I also think using Jekyll would be great for those that love to post recipes
